notification.text: It is time to fill out your periodic assessment.

info.text: It is time to fill out your periodic assessment. Please tap 'Next' to start the questionnaire.

multi.text: Over the last week, how often have you been bothered by having little interest or pleasure in doing things?
multi.choice: More than half of the days

multi.text: Over the last week, how often have you been bothered by feeling down, depressed or hopeless?
multi.choice: More than half of the days

multi.text: Over the last week, how often have you been bothered by trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much?
multi.choice: More than half of the days

multi.text: Over the last week, how often have you been bothered by feeling tired or having little energy?
multi.choice: More than half of the days

multi.text: Over the last week, how often have you been bothered by poor appetite or overeating?
multi.choice: More than half of the days

multi.text: Over the last week, how often have you been bothered by feeling bad about yourself - or that you are a failure or have let your family down?
multi.choice: More than half of the days

multi.text: Over the last week, how often have you been bothered by trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television?
multi.choice: More than half of the days

multi.text: Over the last week, how often have you been bothered by moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed? Or the opposite - being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual?
multi.choice: More than half of the days

multi.text: Over the last week, how often have you been bothered by thoughts that you would be better off dead, or of hurting yourself in some way?
multi.choice: More than half of the days
